snippet.title: Runers - Available On Steam Now
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/306550/

Choose your champion and delve into a vast magical labyrinth to battle fierce monsters and deadly bosses in its darkest depths. 

Gather powerful runes, combine them to conjure up over 280 unique spells and annihilate your foes. Upgrade your spells and unlock new challenges and achievements throughout your quest, selecting formidable new abilities. Navigate through the procedurally-generated dungeon in search of the ultimate challenge and see what mighty magic you can wield! But be careful – if you die, you start again! 

Can you make it to the final floor to defeat the supreme boss in the ultimate showdown? 

Free demo available on http://store.steampowered.com/app/306550/

- Each floor and room is procedurally-generated making each run a new and unique experience 

- Choose from 20 Races and 20 Classes to customize your runs 

- Runes have unique stats that modify the spells you create with them 

- Discover 285 different spells and build your own unique spell loadouts 

- Upgrade your spells to make them even more powerful

- 50 different traits to choose from when leveling up 

- 15+ random bosses and 100+ random enemies to fight 

- Numerous challenges, event rooms, and achievements to complete 

- Defeating enemies unlocks entries in your Beastiary 

- 5 difficulties to increase the challenge

#runersgame 
@LGKGames 
@Mastertronic

http://www.facebook.com/mastertronicgames

http://www.runersgame.com
